---
title: "Task 1: Reading and cleaning data"
---

## Overview

This task covers the basics of reading, cleaning, validating and shaping basic epidemiological data. You will learn how to import data from various sources, clean messy datasets, validate data quality, and prepare data for epidemiological analysis.

## Learning Objectives

- Import epidemiological data from various file formats
- Clean and standardize data structures
- Validate data quality and completeness
- Handle missing values and data inconsistencies

## Tutorial

[Access the tutorial here](https://www.epirhandbook.com/en/new_pages/cleaning.html)

**Note**: This is a long and comprehensive introduction covering the basics of data cleaning. It can be skipped if you are already familiar with working in R and data cleaning workflows.
